
describe-raid-arrays
********************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Describe an instance's RAID arrays.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws opsworks describe-raid-arrays
     [--instance-id <value>]
     [--raid-array-ids <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--instance-id"  (string)
   The instance ID.

"--raid-array-ids"  (list of string)
   An array of RAID array IDs to be described.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]
